issue.title: Python: Add support for nested Python lists in Pandas conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-574](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-574). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Example input: 

```Java
df = pd.DataFrame({"a": [["1", "1"], ["2"]]})
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-574?focusedCommentId=15906820) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 364
